Review.Titre: would love to use tags and bulk edit…
Review.Contenu: would love to use tags and bulk edit the tickets

Review.Titre: A really good tool that we use for QA…
Review.Contenu: A really good tool that we use for QA before going live with a new website. Good for documentation, keeping track of comments, bugs and fixes that needs to be done and where.The tool still has some minor bugs, comments disappearing and the text-area appearing outside the screen when viewing the mobile screen size, but apart from this flawless! Would gladly recommend MarkUp to friends and family!

Markup is such a handy tool! I think the biggest improvement that Markup could make would be to allow the user to update a link in a project that already has edits. We are doing edits on a dev site and the dev link expires after about two days. Which means my developer has to be ready to go, to knock out all of the edits in two days or he will have no idea what Im referring to. The screenshots are definitely helpful, but it would be great if it just allowed up to update the link. The site isn't changing so dramatically that the pins would be super off if it reloaded. Just a tip! Hope that helps!
Sometimes webpages are not shown corectly but otherwise its great!

Review.Titre: With sites that have a lot of pages
Review.Contenu: With sites that have a lot of pages, for example old existing sites, we need to see the urls.  They kind of get lost.
The only thing I don't like about Markup.io is the pricing. Otherwise, it's a very useful tool.

Markup makes it incredibly easy to collaborate on text content and structure in websites.We use it primarily for our marketing and documentation websites, and it really streamlines the process. Since markup makes it possible for anyone, even if they don't know their way around a GitHub repository to leave comments and feedback

Review.Titre: MarkUp is easy to use and a great…
Review.Contenu: MarkUp is easy to use and a great platform for our team to manage content suggestions and edits, all in one, one screen place.

It's a useful tool for getting feedback from multiple people. I use it for marketing/promotional landing pages, and Markup.io refreshes and updates the webpage each time you publish so you always have the latest version for feedback. Also it's easy to share the link and has an easy user interface. Just simple to use and exactly what I needed.

Great for collaboration! As a designer, I need an easy, inexpensive way to share designs with clients and gain their feedback. Markup is perfect for what I need, and I especially like how if you are referencing a live page, it will automatically update so they can see changes in real time.

Review.Titre: This service has been a blessing for…
Review.Contenu: This service has been a blessing for our web design business. It has allowed up the ability to make clear and concise edits to our site either internally or by inviting our client to make edits themselves. It is easy enough for them to work with without much handholding. The only thing I could possibly ask for is a way to draw shapes or lines with a pencil like tool. Otherwise, keep rocking!

Put simply Markup just works, anyone I share a link to has immediate access with little/no friction and the UI is simple to explain in a phone call/message to the users.I had one problem where all pins got detached from a website but other than that! BRILLIANT

I have been looking for this kind of software that can improve our work efficiency! Communication with customers is just too cumbersome to work properly. And even in the same team, everyone has different ideas, and we often slow down our work because of this. But fortunately, this software completely solves these problems! There are even more amazing features. Like markup, I really like this feature. They have streamlined the process, not only giving us less stress and allowing us to communicate quickly, but also making it easier for our customers. I never thought I could end the problem so quickly before. Not only me, but also our whole team likes it very much. I think it will become one of the software we use often.

I used MarkUp.io for a client project which was taking forever to gather feedback from - and which was also confusing and unwieldly because of the number of pages in the website. MarkUp streamlined the process and saved me hours or stress and management - as well as making it much easier for the client. It's a win-win no brainer - especially with their 20 project limit free plan which is what I used.

Review.Titre: MarkUp tool is very easy to use
Review.Contenu: MarkUp tool is very easy to use, simple, does what it needs to do – share, collaborate, improve the workflow by adding annotations. The feature of switching between Comment page and Browse page is fantastic – makes your work efficiently smooth. The support team is absolutely amazing: responsive, open to the feedback, proactive, transparent, creative, and visual. The new version was just released  - thank you for 4 new features-enhancements! You should see their Roadmap...it is outstandingly wow! Always evolving, always improving product.

Unbelievable tool, cut our feedback time in half. If your business requires any feedback this is the program for you. Cuts out all the back and forth and allows me to actually focus on what the client is saying rather than using a doc to scribble my incomprehensible notes and then take half an hour to translate those scribbles.

Review.Titre: A game-changing tool for our web agency
Review.Contenu: A brilliant tool. It's helped our company and clients save a lot of time, and complete projects faster.A game changer for our agency.
It's a really good tool to use in website design & development processes, and for documents too.We find it easy to setup and share with our clients.

Review.Titre: A fantastic tool to help with client…
Review.Contenu: A fantastic tool to help with client notes and corrections on a new and existing website. Has saved me hours trying to work out what they were asking with direct comments on the exact place. Also stores the users device and browser to help with debugging. I use this with every new client

As a website designer, my workflow changed substantially the day I found MarkUp, a few years back, now. I cringe when I think back to the chaos, working through lists of changes & broken telephone of the 'before times' - I don't wish that on anyone - so I pretty much go around recommending MarkUp to every website designer / business owner I chat with :)

The Best Collaboration Tool for DesignersI have been using Markup since its inception and it has saved me a lot of headaches over the past 3+ years when sharing website devs and logo concepts. I can't say enough about it and I recommend it constantly to designers everywhere.

Review.Titre: Simple and easy for everyone to use
Review.Contenu: Simple and easy for everyone to use. Reviewers having no trouble giving good feedback, which we can then track and take action on.  Highly recommended.

Review.Titre: Is a great tool to collaborate and get…
Review.Contenu: Is a great tool to collaborate and get work approved! Makes things so much more easier than trying to decipher emails, working out which requests are for which page/part.

I found markup in the beginning before it went to paid and loved it. Even the paid version is cheaper than most and offers more features with the free version if you like as well.I will continue to be a loyal customer since they have been so good to me and will probably upgrade soon.

Review.Titre: Markup.io is invaluable to our web…
Review.Contenu: Markup.io is invaluable to our web design process.  It make is so easy for our clients to provide feedback.  It's so much easier than receiving an email that says "change the 5th word in the 4th paragraph" or something similar.  We made a quick video to show our clients how to use it.  They love MarkUp, and we love it too!

Review.Titre: Markup is hands-down the BEST platform…
Review.Contenu: Markup is hands-down the BEST platform for feedback between myself and the client. I use Markup on an almost daily basis with my client work. I won't use anything else. It is easy to leave comments, upload attachments and also leave links or discuss a certain part of the design with the client.

Review.Titre: The concept is great and well executed.
Review.Contenu: The concept is great.We have been using Markup for some time.  The features and stability of the product have been improving dramatically.  This is such a useful tool for our web development operations.
Stupidly simple to use. Makes communicating website edits an absolute breeze! Highly recommend MarkUp - you'll wish you found it sooner.

Review.Contenu: I like MarkUp very much and have been using it for a long time, maybe since its born. A Wonderful tool to collaborate with my team members or freelance customers.

Review.Titre: Easy and super effective collaboration tool
Review.Contenu: super easy tool to collaborate on website or other marketing projects. Upload an screenshot or a pfd of your website or a document to work on and start working with your team.

Getting client revisions and edits is such a roadblock when developing a website. Mark Up has given us a tool to get feedback and edits quickly and easily. I think even for the less technical of clients.
As a web designer, MarkUp helps my clients give me feedback easily which I in turn can navigate without headaches. Amazing tool!
MarkUp.io allows for immediate feedback without ruining the open files. Post it notes - with an elite upgrade. Highly recommend for efficient feedback.

Review.Contenu: MarkUp has been a amazing product for us! It has made communication amongst a remote team easier than ever and has saved us countless hours and headaches. I’d recommend it to anyone who works in web design. And you can’t beat the price :)
The site user friendly being very simple to navigate. The ease to receive feedback from customers has made it easier to manager customers concerns

The workflow in MarkUp is immediately understandable! When introducing clients, I just need to explain the difference between browsing and commenting, and that's it. But the best is, even my clients acknowledge its ease of use and understanding!
